abilities.description: The user sprouts an ear on a surface to eavesdrop on conversations from a distance.

keyMoments.title: Robin Uses Oreja Fleur
keyMoments.description: Robin uses Oreja Fleur to sprout an ear and eavesdrop on Marine conversations, gathering intelligence about the G-8 Base.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the espionage applications of the Hana Hana no Mi beyond combat.

trivia.fact: Oreja Fleur (Ear Flower) is an anime-named technique that, while not explicitly named in the manga, demonstrates Robin's ability to sprout any body part for surveillance purposes.
